Energy Dispersal.name: Energy Dispersal
Energy Dispersal.flavor: Your arcane gesture drains away energy within the target, weakening its ability to use its powers.
Energy Dispersal.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. Choose a damage type keyword. The target cannot use a power that has that keyword until the end of your next turn.

Earth-Binder.name: Earth-Binder
Earth-Binder.flavor: Flying creatures acquire an indisputable gravity in your presence.
Earth-Binder.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain an aura 5. A creature that starts its turn in your aura loses its fly speed until it starts its turn outside your aura.

Energy Disruption.name: Energy Disruption
Energy Disruption.flavor: Your swift spell dissipates the dragon’s breath without harm—to you or your allies.
Energy Disruption.trigger: An enemy within range makes a close or area attack with a damage type keyword
Energy Disruption.onHit: 4d10 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target’s attack is canceled. If the attack is not at-will, it is considered expended. The target can choose a different use for the action.
Energy Disruption.onMiss: Half damage and the target takes a -3 penalty to the triggering attack’s rolls.
